handoff_type.description: The type of handoff to notify for. Possible values are 'both', 'oncall', 'offcall'.

notify_advance_in_minutes.description: The number of minutes before the handoff to notify the user. Must be greater than or equal to 0.

type.description: The type of contact method to notify for. Possible values are 'email_contact_method', 'email_contact_method_reference', 'phone_contact_method', 'phone_contact_method_reference', 'push_notification_contact_method', 'push_notification_contact_method_reference', 'sms_contact_method', 'sms_contact_method_reference'.

block.description: The contact method to notify for the user handoff notification rule.

name.description: The name of the priority to find in the PagerDuty API

teams.description: The set of teams associated with the service

label.description: The label of the tag to find in the PagerDuty API

name.description: The name of the team to find in the PagerDuty API

members.description: The set of team memberships associated with the team

team_id.description: The ID of the team to find via the PagerDuty API

label.description: The name of the contact method to find in the PagerDuty API

type.description: The type of the contact method

users.description: List of users who are members of the team
